title: Comments deleted -"don't be a jerk"
body:
I like it when comments that are deleted are included in the deletion notice so that there is some context behind riot suggesting my posts are those of a jerk.  

I mean i have been rude to some complete bell ends on the boards but mostly it is banter and casual ribbing.  

Would be good to get context because the line between banter and being a jerk is a little blurred. Some posts i definitely dont dispute but am currently scratching my head over 2 comments which were recently deleted as i have no idea what was said to warrant their deletion.

replies.body: Lol @ downvotes for a legitimate question.
